content.question: Which of the following claims is made about “the New Negro” in the source?

choices.label: Education and refinement defined the New Negro.
The New Negro had been disenfranchised.
Owning land (“property”) was essential to the New Negro.
The New Negro was focused on money rather than literature.

content.answer: Education and refinement defined the New Negro.

topic.text: 3.11: The New Negro Movement and the Harlem Renaissance

skill.text: 2.A: Identify and explain a source's claim(s), evidence, and reasoning.
